word:
MR No. 215 - Spirit of Prophecy Emphasis Week

     I thought it might not do the boys any harm to have a little excursion in the country, and I could visit a little and while away the time in your absence. Willie enjoyed himself well. Was sorry it was time to come home. The boys played with Eli and worked a little. It was a great treat for them.--Letter 14, 1860.
